II. Purpose of Addendum
The Director reported that Monroe County DHS was changing its address by moving
from office space at 1051 S. Telegraph, Monroe, MI. to 903. S. Telegraph, Monroe,
MI. His application requesting the change of address was submitted on 1/16/08.
III. Methodology
The Director submitted a written description of the new office site. This consultant
toured the site with the Director on 1/17/08.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The Director reported that the new office site encompassed 23,438 square feet of
space. He confirmed that it was more than adequate to meet the needs of children
and families along with providing sufficient office space for staff and secured storage
of records.
During the tour of the facility, this consultant determined the following: There is
ample parking space for staff members, clients and the handicapped. Each staff
member will have a cubicle. There is ample and secure space for storage of records,
4 conference rooms, two interview rooms, a first aid room, and a staff-break room.
Also, an alarm system and security system are in place. Telephone numbers will
remain the same. Also the Director confirmed that both fire safety and health
inspectors checked the site.
V. Recommendation
Based on the findings of this study, it is recommended that Monroe County DHS be
issued a Certificate of Approval reflecting a change of address to 903 S. Telegraph,
Monroe, MI 48161, effective 01/22/08.
